title: eq-date-range
description: The EqDateRangeComponent is an Angular component designed to handle date ranges with various customization options. It supports both view and edit modes, validation, and emits changes to the parent component. The component integrates with Angular forms and Material date picker components.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: The current value of the date range input, formatted as 'YYYY-MM-DD - YYYY-MM-DD'.

inputs.name: placeholder
inputs.description: Placeholder text for the date range input. Defaults to an empty string.

inputs.name: disabled
inputs.description: Whether the date range input is disabled. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: required
inputs.description: Whether the date range input is required. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: nullable
inputs.description: Whether the date range input can be null. Defaults to false.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: The mode of the component, either 'view' or 'edit'. Defaults to 'view'.

inputs.name: title
inputs.description: Optional title for the date range input.

inputs.name: hint
inputs.description: Hint text for the date range input. Defaults to an empty string.

inputs.name: size
inputs.description: The size of the date range input. Defaults to normal.

inputs.name: error
inputs.description: Error message to display when the input is invalid.

inputs.name: usage
inputs.description: The format to use for displaying dates. Defaults to 'date.medium'.

outputs.name: valueChange
outputs.description: Emits the new value when the date range changes.
